import React, { useEffect } from 'react'; import logo from '../images/logo.png'; import teamBg from '../images/team-bg.jpeg'; import { throttle } from 'lodash'; const Landing = () => { useEffect(() => { events(); }, []); const events = () => { window.addEventListener('scroll', throttle(calCaller, 200)); }; const calCaller = () => { console.log('working...'); let items = document.querySelectorAll('.is-revealed'); items.forEach((el) => { calculateScroll(el); }); }; const calculateScroll = el => { let scrollPercent = (el.getBoundingClientRect().y / window.innerHeight) * 100; if (scrollPercent < 75) el.classList.add('is-visible'); } return (
